Reference

Collect Radii Data

Functions to aid collecting, viewing, and outputting radial measurements from structure Images

RFBCoptions()

See or set arguments for common RFishBC functions

digitizeRadii()

Collect radial measurements from a calcified structure by interactively selecting annuli

showDigitizedImage()

Show points selected on a structure image and saved in an RData file

combineData()

Combines radii data from multiple files into

findScalingFactor()

Find scaling factor from object of known length

Back-calculation

Functions to aid back-calculation of lengths at previous ages

bcFuns()

Creates a function for a specific model.

Utilities

Functions to perform miscellaneous utilities.

listFiles()

List files with a specific extension in a folder/directory

addRadCap()

Add total radius-at-capture to wide increments data.

gConvert()

Converts between types of measurements.
